dcterms:creator: B. D. Tapley
S. Bettadpur
M. Watkins
C. Reigber
dcterms:description: The GRACE Accelerometer Data provides measurements from the GRACE satellite mission, which monitored variations in Earth’s gravity field.
dcterms:title: GRACE Accelerometer Data

dcterms:creator: B. Tapley
M. Watkins
F. Flechtner
dcterms:description: The GRACE Follow-On Accelerometer Data continues the data collection efforts of the original GRACE mission, providing insights into climate change.
dcterms:title: GRACE Follow-On Accelerometer Data

dcterms:creator: G. Ahi
H. Cekim
dcterms:description: The GRACE and GRACE Follow-On Data are utilized for long-term predictions of terrestrial water storage changes over global basins.
dcterms:title: GRACE and GRACE Follow-On Data

dcterms:creator: T. Bandikova
C. McCullough
G. L. Kruizinga
H. Save
B. Christophe
dcterms:description: Synthetic Accelerometer Data, referred to as transplant data, were generated to fill gaps in the GRACE mission's accelerometer data.
dcterms:title: Synthetic Accelerometer Data (Transplant Data)

dcterms:creator: N. Darbeheshti
M. Lasser
U. Meyer
D. Arnold
A. Jäggi
dcterms:description: AIUB-GRACE Gravity Field Solutions provide processed gravity field data from the GRACE missions, focusing on processing strategies and instrument parametrization.
dcterms:title: AIUB-GRACE Gravity Field Solutions

dcterms:creator: N. Darbeheshti
H. Wegener
V. Müller
M. Naeimi
G. Heinzel
M. Hewitson
dcterms:description: GRACE Daily Accelerometer Data consists of daily measurements from the GRACE mission, sampled at one-second intervals.
dcterms:title: GRACE Daily Accelerometer Data
